page.title: 07EAST LINTON PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The school was built in 1880. In the main building are three classrooms,a dinner-hall,a gym,office and staffroom.Two of the classes are in mobiles. There is a total of 114 children in the school. The seven years are divided into 5 classes. P1/2 20 children P2/3 25 children P3/4 24 children P5/6 22 children P6/7 23 children There are 5 full-time teachers and 2 part-time ones. We have a football team and two netball teams. They play matches against other schools. We do lots of topics and go on outings for them. One topic was Transport. We went to Waverley Station and the Royal Scottish Museum.
